title: Circular Linked List â€“ Insert and Display
description: Java implementation where the tail points back to head.
explanation: Tail next points to head. do-while loop used to traverse because head is not null. Time: O(n).

title: Floyd's Cycle Detection
description: Detect a cycle in a linked list using slow and fast pointers.
explanation: Slow moves 1 step, fast moves 2 steps. If they meet, cycle exists. Time: O(n), Space: O(1).
